articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Google says its new AI models can identify emotions — and that has experts worried - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is releasing a new open model family, PaliGemma 2. Experts are concerned about its emotion recognition capabilities.
articles.content:
Google says its new AI model family has a curious feature: the ability to “identify” emotions.
Announced on Thursday, the PaliGemma 2 family of models can analyze images, enabling the AI to generate… [+5038 chars]
